summary: "Deadpool & Wolverine" is a 2024 superhero movie based on Marvel comics. It's the third "Deadpool" movie and part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). The film stars Ryan Reynolds as Deadpool and Hugh Jackman as Wolverine. Deadpool teams up with Wolverine from another universe to stop the Time Variance Authority from destroying his world. The movie was directed by Shawn Levy and includes a mix of actors from previous "X-Men" films and other Marvel productions. It was made by Marvel Studios, Maximum Effort, and 21 Laps Entertainment, and distributed by Walt Disney Studios. "Deadpool & Wolverine" had a successful premiere and release in July 2024, breaking records and becoming one of the highest-grossing films of all time.
title: Deadpool & Wolverine
